name: Balls Bricks Breaker King
description:
Bricks Breaker King 2020 is an addictive and challenging brick game.
Just play it to relax your brain. Be focus on breaking bricks and you will find it more funny and exciting.

How to play
- Hold the screen with your finger and move to target brick.
- Find best positions and angles to hit all bricks.
- When the durability of brick reaches 0, destroyed.
- Never let bricks reach the bottom otherwise game is over.
- Tap to ball and move to right or left for best shoot.

Features
- Colorful bricks.
- More skins of ball!
- Free to play.
- Easy game controls with one finger.
- Thousands of stages! Endless game mode.
- Play offline: Enjoy this game without WiFi.

Start to enjoy with your game.
